name: Diggy
description:
This is an unfinished draft of a game where I tested out multiple movement, physics, and animation systems, an art style, and some sound effects.  I hope you can find some enjoyment in its physics systems and jank.  

I'm thinking of one day using the brain mine setting and a digital version of this art style.  I have some level and character ideas that might one day come to fruition if I pursue this project in the future.  If I did, I would have to start from scratch though because as it is now, it is unorganized, filled with console errors, and tied together by some pretty strange scripts.  

This game and the upcoming Chameleon game were both work in progresses for far too long, and I decided to scramble them together quickly.  Even if there are still unfinished, I wanted to submit them here so that I could clear my slate and work on just one project at a time.
